thread.title: RTX 4070 gaming laptop dropped to impressively low price in Amazon deal
thread.title_full: RTX 4070 gaming laptop dropped to impressively low price in Amazon deal

author: tomas.watkins@bgfg.co.uk (Tomas Watkins)
title: RTX 4070 gaming laptop dropped to impressively low price in Amazon deal
text:
Asus TUF F15 Gaming Laptop
RTX 4070 gaming laptop dropped to impressively low price in Amazon deal
This gaming laptop is shockingly low in price for the specs.
WePC is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Prices subject to change.
Learn more
January brings in the deals, and if you’re on the hunt for a powerful RTX
gaming laptop that won’t break the bank, the search just got easier. We’ve stumbled upon a fantastic New Year deal on the Asus TUF F15 on Amazon, offering serious power for enjoying the latest AAA games without a hefty price tag.
Amazon is currently running a deal on this i7-12700H gaming laptop, priced at a reasonable $1299.00. That’s 9%, or $121.02 off from the original price of $1,420.02.
What do we like about this ASUS gaming laptop deal?
- 14-Core CPU Power: The 12700H processor rips through creative workloads, intense multitasking, and demanding games with gusto.
- Display Outputs: The HDMI 2.1, and Mini DisplayPort connections support bleeding-edge monitors and bandwidth-heavy accessories.
- SSD game storage: Its dual 1TB PCIe NVME SSDs provide abundant space for today’s ballooning 100GB+ game installs with lightning-fast access.
- Next-Gen Graphics: The RTX 4070 GPU harnesses AI and hardware ray tracing for high-fidelity visuals that approach photorealism in supported titles.
- Intelligent Noise Cancellation: A built-in AI-powered algorithm filters out ambient sound for crystal-clear audio on calls and voice chat.
- Connectivity: Numerous Thunderbolt 4 and USB-A 3.2 ports offer flexibility for wired mice, gamepads, external mics, cameras, and flash drives galore.
Should you invest in this ASUS gaming laptop deal?
We believe the Asus TUF F15 provides excellent value for money. It is a powerhouse for gaming and multitasking on the move. Inside its durable frame, Intel’s latest 14-core i7 processor and RTX 4070 graphics blast through AAA titles and creative programs with ease. Visuals shine brightly on the vibrant 144Hz display while keeping motion smooth. The massive 32GB of RAM lets you shuttle between apps and games without slowdown, backed up by ample 2TB of SSD storage. With multiple USB and video ports, including Thunderbolt 4, connectivity is versatile too. For roughly $1,299, you get superior hardware components that blend speed and price.
